data.body:
Generated by orchestration session orch-1770979776428-3jd26f.
Objective: Verify foolery-11j (console stop button) and land independent UI fixes: remove header text, fix bead hierarchy, fix repo cycling defaults
Agent plan:
- 3 x frontend (react/next.js)
Assigned beads:
- foolery-11j: console 'stop' button
- foolery-smj: remove "Fooler" header text from top left corner of /beads
- foolery-gps: bead hierarchy in list view is broken
- foolery-iki: cmd shift R always goes to All Repositories
- foolery-k18: don't make 'all repositories' default state
Notes: foolery-11j just needs verification pass. foolery-iki + foolery-k18 are related repo-cycling issues — assign to same agent. foolery-smj is trivial removal. foolery-gps is a rendering bug.
Assumptions:
- foolery-s3q (not in p0 set) will be resolved before wave 2 items that depend on it
- foolery-mqv.2.5 and foolery-mqv.5 (p1, stage:verification) will pass verification and unblock foolery-mqv.2.6
- foolery-iki and foolery-k18 are related enough to assign to one agent
- foolery-11j verification requires manual QA or automated test confirmation

data.title: Wave clooney-heat: Verify in-flight + quick UI fixes
